#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
ll int a[100010],dp[100010];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	ll int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		ll int n,k;
		cin>>n>>k;
		ll int i;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
		}
		sort(a,a+n);
		ll int ans=0;
		dp[n-1]=1;
		ans=max(ans,dp[n-1]);
		for(i=(n-2);i>=0;i--)
		{
			if((a[i+1]-a[i])<=k)
			{
				dp[i]=1+dp[i+1];
			}
			else
			{
				dp[i]=1;
			}
			ans=max(ans,dp[i]);
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
